description:
An ultimate internet/network control, security and statistical tool for Windows.

NetLimiter in an ultimate internet/network control, security and statistical tool for Windows.
Use it to manage bandwidth of individual applications, monitor data coming to and out of your machine in real-time, block unwanted intruders, analyze network problems and much more...
This update brings several mild improvements, but main focus was on system compatibility - we updated most frameworks and libraries we use.
NetLimiter runs on Windows 7 and new systems, but it becomes harder and harder to support older OS. It is not definitive, but we will probably end support for Windows 7 and 8 in first half of the 2026*. Older NetLimiter versions (like the one currently realesed) will still run on old machines, but new updates won't.

New features
- New improved tray icon functionality.
- Added tray icon widget with various tools and infos.
- Many more texts translated to all supported languages. (If you find any translation problem, please contact us at support@netlimiter.com)
- Added Pause option to Traffic chart.
Fixed bugs
- Traffic chart rare synchorinization bug fixed.
